dataList.name: İnsan Kurbanı
dataList.desc:
Ceset yağmalıyorlar, bir şey ararmış gibi.
Kulaklarında bir kurban isteyişinin acımasız çınlayışını duyuyorsun.
Her an atlayabilirmiş gibi duruyorlar.

Yakınlarda ise ölen birisini görüyorsun, nefes almakta güçlük çekiyor.
Bu insanı kurban olarak vermeli misin?
Ya da…

options.messageDesc: Tüm müttefikler SP kaybeder, bir E.G.O Hediyesi kazan.
result: Tatmin olmuş bir şekilde, kilden oyuncaklar yakında ceset olacak bedeni uzaklara sürüklediler.

options.messageDesc: Bir karşılaşma başlar, daha güçlü bir E.G.O Hediyesi için karşılaşmayı kazan.
result: Eylemsizliğinden sinirlenmiş bir şekilde, kil oyuncaklar sana saldırdılar.

“Kafayı mı sıyırdın, Müdür?”

Günahkârlar fikrine bozulmuş gibi gözüküyor.

dataList.name: İnsan Kurbanı
dataList.desc:
Günahkârlar seçenek dışı gibi gözüküyor.

Bu insanı kurban olarak vermeli misin?
Ya da…

options.messageDesc: Tüm müttefikler SP kaybeder, bir E.G.O Hediyesi kazan.
result: Tatmin olmuş bir şekilde, kilden oyuncaklar yakında ceset olacak bedeni uzaklara sürüklediler.

options.messageDesc: Bir karşılaşma başlar, daha güçlü bir E.G.O Hediyesi için karşılaşmayı kazan.
result: Eylemsizliğinden sinirlenmiş bir şekilde, kil oyuncaklar sana saldırdılar.

dataList.name: Ebedi Uyku
dataList.desc:
Zayıf bir ses duyuyorsun.

“Lütfen, yardım…”

Sesi takip edecek misin? Ya da…

options.messageDesc: Bir Kibir testi dene. E.G.O Hediyesi kazan.
result:
Enkaz altında acı içinde bir asker var.

“Lütfen beni öldürün… acı çekiyorum.”

Bu şahısı görmezden gelemezsin.
Onu hakkına kavuşturması için kimi görevlendireceksin?

Belki de yalnızca duyuların seninle oynuyordu.
Uğultulu rüzgarın bir insan sesiyle karıştırılması çok da ender bir şey değil.

Hızlıca oradan uzaklaşmaya karar verdin.

dataList.name: Katlanamaz Olanla Bir Karşılaşma
dataList.desc:
Dar bir geçitten geçerken, bir hamamböceği sürüsü bir anda önüne çıktı.
Haşırtılar neredeyse tiksindirici derecede fazla.

Onların yanından mi dolaşacaksın? Ya da…

options.messageDesc: Tüm müttefikler SP kaybeder
result:
“Iyyyyyy… bi tanesi bacağıma tırmandı!”

Herkes geçitten geçmeyi başardı, ama tiksintikeri gayet de barizdi.
Bu deneyimden yorulmuş gözüküyorlar.

options.message: Yetti artık. Günahkârlara hamamböceklerini ezmelerini söyle.
options.messageDesc: Gregor büyük miktarda SP kaybeder. Karşılaşma başlat. E.G.O Hediyesi kazanmak için karşılaşmayı yen.
result:
“Çh…”

Gregor mutsuz bir şekilde katliama sırtını döndü.
Kısa bir süre sonra, bir grup sinirli böcek asker bize doğru koşarak geliyordu.

dataList.name: Şüpheli Derecede Parlak Otomat
dataList.desc:
Fabrikanın ortasında, büyük butonlara sahip bir otomat buluyorsunuz.

Renkli, ek olarak süslüler de.
Onlara basmak için güçlü bir zorlanma hissediyorsunuz.

Hangisine basacaksın?

options.message: Yumruk işareti olan kırmızı butona bas.
options.messageDesc: E.G.O Hediyesi kazan.
result:
“Tebriker! Tebrikler!”

Oluktan aşağıya doğru bir şey gürledi.

Oyuncak bir yumruğa benziyor.

options.message: Ayak işareti olan sarı butona bas.
options.messageDesc: E.G.O Hediyesi kazan.
result:
“Tebrikler! Tebrikler!”

Oluktan aşağıya doğru bir şey gürledi.

Oyuncak bir ayağa benziyor.

options.message: Kalp işareti olan yeşil butona bas.
options.messageDesc: E.G.O Hediyesi kazan.
result:
“Tebrikler! Tebrikler!”

Oluktan aşağıya doğru bir şey gürledi.

Oyuncak bir vidaya benziyor.

options.messageDesc: 3 E.G.O Hediyesi kazan. Ama…
result:
“Hata! Hata!”

Otomat çıngırdamaya başladı.

“H-Hey, bu şeyin sorunu ne?”

“Ah, açgözlü olmaman gerektiğini bilmeliyd—”

Günahkâr lafını bitiremeden, otomat bir sürü oyuncağı havaya fırlatırken patladı.

Tuhaf dürtülerine karşı gelmelisin.
Bilinmeyenle uğraşmak elbette kötü bir fikir.

Hiçbir şeye dokunmadan otomatı terk ettiniz.

dataList.name: Aşırı Şiddet İçeren Heyecan Verici Eğlendirici Eğitim!
dataList.desc:
Geçitten ayrılırken, devasa bir ruletin başında duran birkaç siborga denk geliyorsunuz.

“Ah. Fazlasıyla. Heyecanlı. İyice. Eğlenceli.”
“ÖL-ÜM OYUNU!”

Farklı ritimlerde konuşurken, size yaklaşmaay başlıyorlar.
Görünüşe göre bir tur rulet oynamanızı istiyorlar. Ne yapmalısınız?

options.messageDesc: Rodion SP kazanır. Öfke, Tembellik ve Kasvet kontrolleri yap. E.G.O Hediyesi kazanmak ve tüm müttefiklerin SP'lerini iyileştirmek için geç.
result:
“Burası benim parlamam gereken yer, bilirsin ya!”

Rodya, gururla bunu söylerken ileriye doğru bir adım attı.
Suartındaki heyecan ve beklenti görülebiliyordu.

options.messageDesc: Rodion SP kaybeder. Çatışma başlat. Kazanarak E.G.O Hediyesi al.
result:
Şu an oyun oynamanın zamanı değil.
Hadi şu çılgın siborgları alt edip yolumuza devam edelim

“Pşş...”

Rodya memnuniyetsiz bir şekilde dudaklarını şapırdattı, ama biliyorsun ki her zaman bir Günahkârın isteğini karşılayamazsın.

dataList.name: Mutlu Musun?
dataList.desc:
Pembe çerçeveye sahip kalın bir cam kapı öylece duruyordu.
Yukarıda duran elektronik ekran bir anda canlandı ve bir soru sordu.

“Mutlu musun?”

Cevabın ne olacak?

result:
“Ne güzel!”

Ekran, yeşil bir ışığı emerek bizim için bir kapı oluşturdu.
Görünüşe bakılırsa ilerleyebiliriz.

dataList.name: Mutlu musun? 2
dataList.desc:
“Sana mutluluğu getirebilecek bir çift pembe ayakkabı var.”

Ekran kırmızı parlamaya başladı.

“Denemek ister misin?”

options.messageDesc: E.G.O Hediyesi kazan
result:
Cam kapı açıldı ve bahsi geçen pembe ayakkabılar ortaya çıktı.

Bunları giydiğin zaman, pembe kurdelelerin bacaklarının etrafına dolaştığını hissedeceksin.
Bedeninin etrafına sıkılaşmaya başlasa da, hoş olmayan bir şey hissetmiyorsun.

Sanki istediğin herhangi bir yere gidebilecekmişsin gibi hissediyorsun.

options.messageDesc: Bir çatışma başlat.
result:
“Pembe ayakkabıların görkeminden çekinme!”

Geriye çekildiğin gibi pembe ayakkabıların yaydığı ışık gitti.

“Seni istediğin yere götürecekler!”

Ekran delirmişçesine titremeye başladı,
ve pembe kurdelelere dolanmış bir grup kişi ayaklarını yere sürte sürte kapıdan içeriye girdiler.

dataList.name: Saat Mekanizması Olan Eski Oda
dataList.desc:
Bu harap edilmiş odanın içerisinde bir makine var.
Uzun, iri bir kol, yaylarla süslenmiş olan makinenin merkezinde öylece duruyor.

Kolu çekme arzusu… Daha da… Ve daha da… Güçleniyor.

Ne yapacaksın?

options.messageDesc: %50 şans ile pozitif; %50 şans ile negatif efekt kazanırsın.

result:
Artık çocuk değilsin. Arzularına karşı gelebilecek birisin.
Böylesine aklının çelinmesine iki defa düşünmeden izin vermek, asla iyi bir fikir değil.

“Evet, iyi düşündün.”

Günahkârlar ile odayı terk ettin.

dataList.name: Saat Mekanizması Olan Eski Oda
dataList.desc:
Spontan bir düşünceyi eyleme geçirmek, bir çocuğun limitleri aşacak kadar kaytarması kadar dürtüseldir.

Kolu çekmenle bir tıkırtı geldi.
Yayların bazıları hızlı, bazıları da yavaş şekilde dönmeye başladı.
Kimisi saat yönünde, kimisi de tam tersi.

Makinenin gürültü seslerinin yükseldiğini duymak, seni telaşlandırmaya başladı.

options.messageDesc: %50 şans ile E.G.O Hediyesi kazan. Başarısızlık, SP hasarı verir.
result:
Makine en sonunda durakladı.

“Heh… Şuna da bir bakın!”

Küçük, odundan bir sandık yerden yükseldi.
Dikkatlice açtın, içerisinde ise bir dizi meşale mevcuttu.

Belki çok değildi ama, en azından bir süreliğine karanlıkta seni rahatlatacaktı.
Meşaleleri odadan çıkarttın.

Makine en sonunda durakladı.

“N-Ne oluyor?!”

Makinenin huzurunda, oda titremeye ve çatırdamaya başladı.
Bir süre sonra, çatı ikiye yarılarak birçok çivinin aşağıya doğru yağmasına sebep oldu.

“Dışarı, hemen!”

“Kahretsin, sana bununla uğraşmanın kötü bir fikir olduğunu söylemiştim!!”

Günahkârlar ile odayı hemen terk ettiniz, ama zararsız bir şekilde değil.

dataList.name: Mühürlü Kapının Karşısında
dataList.desc:
Odanın bir tarafında, çelikten bir kapı öylece duruyor.
Zorla açmak veya kırmak için epey sert, kalın bir görünüşe sahip.

“Eğer bu kadar sıkı korunuyorsa, içeride kesinlikle değerli bir şey olmalı~!”

Günahkâr haklı olabilir, belki de içeride değerli bir şey vardır.
Ne yapacaksın?

options.messageDesc: Öfke denemesi yap. Geçerek haritada yeni bir geçiş aç.

options.message: Bir çözüm yolu için etrafa bakın.
options.messageDesc: Tembellik denemesi yap. Geçerek haritada yeni bir geçit aç.

result:
Gereksiz risk almaktansa bilinen yola bağlı kalmak daha güvenli olur.

“Off~ Yemin ederim içeride bir şeyler olmalı!”

Günahkârların bazıları şikayetçi de olsa, bırakıp gitmeleri için onları ikna edebildin.

dataList.name: İlk Geçit
dataList.desc:
Uzakta devasa bir geçit gördünüz.
Sivri çitler ve taş duvarlar hakkında ürkütücü bir şey var gibi.

İleriye giden tek yol burası gibi görünüyor, ancak birçok Engizitör tarafından korunmakta.
Onlar hakkında yapabileceğimiz bir şey var mı?

options.messageDesc: Gurur denemesi yap, ardından da çatışma başlat. Geçerek müttefiklere takviye sağla ve dalgaların sayısını 1 azalt.
Şehvet denemesi yap, ardından çatışma başlat. Geçerek dalgaların sayısını 2 azalt.
3 dalgadan oluşan bir çatışma başlat.
result:
Bazen, en iyi çözüm en basit olandır.
Günahkârlardan birini grubumuzdan ayırıp, sinsi bir numara denemek bizi dezavantaja sokabilir.

Hadi onlarla doğrudan yüzleşelim.

dataList.name: Sandıklarla Dolu Oda
dataList.desc:
Düzinelerce eski sandıklar, odanın içerisinde dağıtılmış bir şekilde duruyor.

“Eyvah, örümcek ağları…”

Etrafı temizlerken; gözle ayırt edilebilir şekilde büyük, 3 adet gömülü sandık buldunuz.

“Hepsi de kilitli.”

“Görünüşe göre hepsinin de anahtar delikleri aynı boyutlarda!”

“…Ne yazık ki, anahtar yumuşak bir yapıya sahip. Sandıklardan birisini açtıktan sonra ötekini açacak kadar sağlam bir yapısı olmayacak.”

Yani sadece bir tanesini açabilirsin.
Hangisini açacaksın?

options.messageDesc: Defansını artıran bir E.G.O Hediyesi elde et.
result:
“Bu…”

Sandığın içerisinde aşınmış bir miğfer bulunuyordu.

“Oho?! Bu; bir şövalyenin en temel ekipmanı, değil mi?!”

Günahkârlardan birisi miğferi alıp temizlemek adına ovmaya başladı.
Tüm sonuçları düşününce o kadar da kötü değil.
Miğferi alarak (ve de Günahkârlardan birisi ona delicesine his beslemeye başlayarak) odayı terk ettik.

options.messageDesc: %50 şans ile Sarsıntı saldırılarını güçlendiren bir E.G.O Hediyesi kazan.
result:
“Bu…”

Sandığın içerisinde eski bir tokmak vardı.
Tutma yerindeki çatlaklar kullanılabilirliği hakkında birçok sorunun sorulmasına sebebiyet vermişti.

“Bu şey kesinlikle bir işimize yaramaz!”

Günahkârlar, bu acınacak seçime karşı bir hayal kırıklılığı yaşıyordu.
Ama tokmağın seninle iletişim kurmaya çalıştığını hissedebiliyordun,
alman için seni zorluyordu.

“Ne, onu alacak mısın??”

Günahkârlara işlevsizmiş gibi gözükse de,
tokmağı almanın iyi bir fikir olduğunu düşündün.

“…Boş mu?”

Sandığın içi tamamen boştu.
Bizi karşılayan tek şey, havanın etkisiyle hareketlenen minik toz ve kir parçacıklarıydı.

“Size diğerini açmamız gerektiğini söylemiştim~”

“Hayır, benzerliklerini düşününce muhtemelen o da boştu.”

Günahkârların şikayetlerini görmezden gelerek odadan çıktın.

options.messageDesc: %50 şans ile Kanama saldırılarını güçlendiren bir E.G.O Hediyesi kazan.
result:
“Bu…”

Sandığın içerisinde kahverengileşmiş bir çivi vardı.
Bir paket değil; normal bir çiviye nazaran büyük, pas ve tozla kaplanmış bir çivi

“Kahretsin…”

Günâhkarlar, anahtarı bu çivide harcadıkları için harap olmuş bir şekilde bakıyorlardı.

“Ganimeti yere atmak da olmazdı. Kullanmayacaksan, bir başkasına ver.”

Günahkârlardan birisinin ilgisini çekmişti, sen de çiviyi ona verip yoluna devam ettin.

“…Boş mu?”

Sandığın içi tamamen boştu.
Bizi karşılayan tek şey, havanın etkisiyle hareketlenen minik toz ve kir parçacıklarıydı.

“Size diğerini açmamız gerektiğini söylemiştim~”

“Hayır, benzerliklerini düşününce muhtemelen o da boştu.”

Günahkârların şikayetlerini görmezden gelerek odadan çıktın.

dataList.name: Yargıcı Kim Yargılar
dataList.desc:
N Şirketi Engizitörleri birisine işkence etmekle meşguldü.

“AAAAAAH!”

Sıkış tepiş olan odayı, filtrelenmiş bir çığlık dolduruyordu.
Onların kurbanları, protez beden parçalarına sahip kişilerdi.

“……”

Sinclair tek bir kelime etmedi, gözünde korku ve öfke ile işkence eden kişilere bakıyordu.
Düzensiz aralıklarla ağır ağır nefes alıyor, bedeni sallanıyordu; her an saldırabilecek gibi bir hâli vardı.

Onu durduracak mısın?
Yoksa…

options.messageDesc: Belirli Kişilikler SP kaybeder
result:
Sahne izlenmek için fazla korkunç da olsa, biz yürekli şövalyeler değiliz.
Zeki bir müdür, ufak bir dürtü yüzünden tüm Günahkârları kaybetmenin riskini almaz.
Bu durumda…

“…Anlaşıldı.”

Sinclair elini omzuna koyduğun zaman siniri bozulmuş bir şekilde sana doğru baktı, ama hemen ardından başını aşağıya eğerek kararını onayladı.

…Umarım, doğru karar budur.
İşkence bitene kadar oturup izlemeye karar verdin.

options.messageDesc: Öfke denemesi yap, ardından çatışma başlat. Deneme için Sinclair'i kullanarak ‘İşaret’ kazan. Geçerek tüm düşmanları zayıflat.
result:
Cesur şövalyeler olmayabiliriz.
Ancak, ahlâkı bir kenara bıraksak bile ilerlemek için onlarla savaşmak zorundayız.

“…İstediğin gerçekten bu mu?”

Sinclair'e planını açıkladığın zaman, şaşırmış bir şekilde sana baktı.

“Beni durduracağını sanmıştım…”

Tedirgin olmuş gibi konuşsa da, kararını duyunca sevinmişti.

“Anlaşıldı. Yapacağım.”

Sinclair, Egizitörlerin olduğu yere doğru diğer Günahkârlar ile koşmaya başladı.

dataList.name: A Rotting Corpse’s Memento
dataList.desc:
“Gehk, what’s this odor…”

The Sinners frowned at the olfactory assault.
Following their eyes, you find an Inquisitor collapsed on the floor.

“Definitely dead…”

The smell must be coming from the rotting corpse.
While everyone was hesitant to approach, you see something sparkle.

There seems to be something amidst the writhing manes…
What will you do?

options.messageDesc: Run a Gluttony check. Pass to gain an E.G.O Gift. Fail to lose HP and SP.

result:
Surely it’s nothing.
If we really need it, we can always recover it later.

You’d rather not damage the psyches of your Sinners for something so uncertain.

dataList.name: [Hel. P. Me. He. Lp.]
dataList.desc:
You hear snappy mechanical noises through the closed door.

“Sounds like a cry for help…”

As you focus your attention, you begin to hear footsteps.

“Steel… Those are clangs of steel…”

Sinclair froze.
It looks like an Inquisitor is coming for them.
What will you do?

options.messageDesc: Sinclair heals SP. Begin a combat encounter. Win to gain an E.G.O Gift.
result:
“…I knew I could count on you.”

Sinclair jumped in as soon as you told him what to do.
As you expected, a number of prosthetic people were bound by ropes.

“Get out of here, quickly!”

As soon as he untied them, they hurriedly ran out of the room.

“Tch… The heretics!”

We were a little late to leave; the Inquisitors shouted as they entered the room.
It seems conflict is unavoidable.

“…I knew I could count on you.”

Sinclair jumped in as soon as you told him what to do.
As you expected, a number of prosthetic people were bound by ropes.

“Get out of here, quickly!”

As soon as he untied them, they hurriedly ran out of the room.

“Bastards, not even a simple thank you.”

Some of the Sinners complained,
but Sinclair looked satisfied with the deed.

Calming them down, we left the room.

options.messageDesc: Sinclair loses SP.
result:
“N—No… How could…”

Sinclair seems to be shocked by your answer.
As unfortunate as this is, losing manpower while trying to save those people would be a fatal detriment for the coming engagements.

[H. He. Help. H. Hel…]

We left in a hurry, leaving behind their plaintive cries.

dataList.name: Rite of Suppuration
dataList.desc:
The passage was red-hot.

“Yeesh, that’d melt my shoes.”

The Sinners carefully approached the road, only to retreat from the overwhelming heat.
Something was written on the sign in front of the passage:

Prove your humanity 
And through weakness and suppuration
Sear a path with mobilization

It took no time at all to figure out what that meant.
…What will you do?

options.messageDesc: Only available if the E.G.O Gift [N Corp. Seal] is in possession.
result:
“We’ve proved ourselves already, haven’t we?”

A Sinner suggested.
It reminded you that you bore proof.

“Right… The seal!”

Tagging the seal on the sign caused the passage to cool in an instant.
We were able to tread without a problem.

options.messageDesc: Run a Wrath check. Pass to gain an E.G.O Gift. Failing begins a 3-wave combat encounter.
50% chance for a 3-wave combat encounter.
result:
It seems too dangerous to make any Sinner cross this searing passage.

Not to mention that you don’t know if there’s anything to make the trip easier for the rest, even if someone managed to cross it.
You figure you might be able to take another route as long as you’re careful not to get spotted.

Unfortunately, a group of patrolling Inquisitors noticed you.

It seems too dangerous to make any Sinner cross this searing passage.

Not to mention that you don’t know if there’s anything to make the trip easier for the rest, even if someone managed to cross it.
You figure you might be able to take another route as long as you’re careful not to get spotted.

Fortunately, you managed to get through without being noticed.

dataList.name: A Vessel of Zeal
dataList.desc:
You see a pedestal adorned with the engravings of a nail and hammer.

“Must have something to do with N Corp.”

A Sinner mutters, and you agree.
Should you try to get some info on N Corp? Or…

options.message: Examine the book on the pedestal.
options.messageDesc: Gain an E.G.O Gift
result:
Upon the pedestal was a tome N Corp. Inquisitors were often seen carrying.
You take this chance to peek at a few pages of it…

“Ugh…”

The indecipherable content only gave you a headache.
You decide to hold onto it for now and read it later.

options.message: Stay away from the noise and leave.
result:
We know enough already.
It’s not worth snooping around suspicious areas.

dataList.name: Rite of Confrontation
dataList.desc:
An inscription above the closed gate reads:

Prove your terror and fears
Fill this vessel with tears

Looking around, you find the supposed vessel next to an unpleasant-looking chair.
What will you do?

options.messageDesc: Run a Gloom check. Selected Identity loses SP. Pass to gain an E.G.O Gift.

result:
It’s too dangerous to attempt a rite when you aren’t even sure of how it works.
We left the room.

dataList.name: Exhibit of Human Parts
dataList.desc:
You find a row of glass containers in a corner of the main area.
Inside them are dried organs and pieces of life showing active movement.

“A tragic display…”

The containers can be opened easily. You could take one of the pieces if you want to.
What will you do?

options.messageDesc: Gain an E.G.O Gift that provides healing at low health.
result:
You took the glowing skull.
It radiates gently, and you feel a strange warmth from it.

The other containers won’t open. It seems that you can take only one.
You took your leave with the item you chose.

options.messageDesc: Gain an E.G.O Gift that provides power-ups at low health.
result:
The bloody fingers caught your attention.
When you open the container to hold it, you notice that blood continues to drip from the section.
You pick it up by a perpetually flinching digit.

The other containers won’t open. It seems that you can take only one.
You took your leave with the item you chose.

options.messageDesc: Gain an E.G.O Gift that provides benefits after winning a Clash.
result:
The slithering tongue attracts your eyes.
When you open the container and grab it, it flaps in your palm.

You feel as though the tongue is mocking you, so you try to pick another one, but…

The other containers won’t open. It seems that you can take only one.
You have to take your leave with the item you chose.

You decide not to take anything.

You’d rather not bother with touching creepy organs.
Like that, we left the place.

dataList.name: Rite of Penance
dataList.desc:
A passage is written above the large gate:

Only those who repent may find motion
Thorn yourself, atone through flagellation

It looks like it wants us to impale ourselves on spikes.
What will you do?

options.messageDesc: Run a Wrath check. Selected Identity loses HP. Pass to gain an E.G.O Gift.

result:
There’s simply too much risk involved.
You don’t see a point in giving the order to fling someone onto the spikes.

We left the room.

dataList.name: Rite of Conclusion
dataList.desc:
Hideously transformed N Corp. Inquisitors stood guard at the gate.
You moved to attack, but they don’t appear to be hostile in any capacity.

“Only. Exceptional… ones. Are allowed. In, this place.”

“To… pass. You, will. Prove yourself. Worthy.”

You aren’t exactly sure what they mean by “proving yourself”.
What should you do?

options.message: Present proof of passing the rites.
options.messageDesc: Only available if the E.G.O Gift [N Corp. Seal] or all three Tokens of Innocence, Tears, and Atonement are in possession.
result:
You remembered what you’ve been collecting.
If the things your group went through were tests, then what you received must be the proof of your “worth”.

“…You may, pass.”

The Inquisitors opened the gate, wailing in bizarre voices.

“Take, this. With… you.”

Receiving the item, we walked through the door.

options.messageDesc: Run a Lust check. Pass to proceed. Fail to begin a difficult combat encounter.
Gain ‘A Sign’. Begin a difficult combat encounter.
result:
It seems violence will be our most straightforward solution.

“…Here-tic.”

The voice spilling out of that shaking jaw must be one of pure hostility.

“Allow me to help… Manager.”

Sinclair tightened the grip on his weapon, determination burning quietly in his eyes.

dataList.name: Inquisition
dataList.desc:
You met an N Corp. Inquisitor.

Instead of attacking, they ask us if we loathe prosthetics.
What should you say?

result:
You agreed with the Inquisitor.
They laughed and walked away.

You disagreed with the Inquisitor.
Sinclair quietly nodded to you.
The angered Inquisitor called their subordinates.

You gave the Inquisitor a silent glare.
They lost interest in you and walked away.

dataList.name: Fanaticism
dataList.desc:
N Corp. Inquisitors are torturing prosthetic people.
You see Sinclair tremble with fear and anger.
What will you do?

options.message: Wait for the torture to end.
result:
As painful as it is to watch, it might cause unnecessary conflict.
We should wait for them to finish.

We can’t just sit back and watch, even if it means getting into a fight we could avoid.
Determined, Sinclair gripped his weapon.

dataList.name: Test of Worthiness
dataList.desc:
Strangely shaped N Corp. Inquisitors guard the gate.

“Only… those with worth… may enter.”

“To pass… you will show… your worth.”

What will you do?

options.message: Present proof of passing the rites.
result:
You showed the Inquisitors the tokens you got from those rituals.

They silently opened the door.
As you passed through, they gave you something.

All we can do is fight.
Let’s handle this with violence.

dataList.name: 아즈텍원판 선택지1
dataList.desc:
There are many ways to calm one down,
but this Abnormality seems to like gifts the most.
A fresh batch of blood might be able to appease it.

result:
You gave a living clay doll as tribute.
Satiated, the Abnormality calmed down for a moment.

dataList.name: 아즈텍원판 선택지3
dataList.desc:
To weaken the flame, you’ll need cool water.
Since we aren’t carrying any buckets of water, we should offer up someone cool instead.

result:
You gave a living clay doll as tribute.
The flame shrunk to a flicker.

dataList.name: 아즈텍원판 선택지5
dataList.desc:
The stars are twinkling.
When they shine, they’ll rob us all of our sight.
What gift would the stars like?

dataList.name: 강화인간 선택지1
dataList.desc:
How do those cyborgs keep coming back?
The Sinners were discussing.

“Perhaps those beings are not alive.
That way, they would not be able to die.”

“No, we’re not getting philosophical here.”

“Hmm~ To me, it looked like rebuilding a brick wall.”

“…I think I’m hearing something from that factory in the back.”

The group turned their gaze to the factory behind the cyborgs.
Metallic clanking could be heard from the place that was quiet until moments ago.

Maybe you should take a look at that shady facility?

result:
You decided to check out the factory.
But, you might want to do something about the cyborgs first, just to be safe.

Perhaps you could earn enough time to get through by incapacitating the biggest one?

options.message: We can’t walk into unknown danger like that. Keep fighting them.
result:
“Do we really have to crawl into a place like that?”

One Sinner spoke bluntly.
They make a good point. No need to take risks.

If they keep coming back, we’ll just keep on beating them until they don’t.

dataList.name: 강화인간 선택지2
dataList.desc:
Pinning down the largest cyborg as planned, you got to the factory in time.

“Huh, this is…”

“Looks like some kind of toy plant.”

The Sinners comment on the huge mechanism.

“Ah! Come behold this curiosity!”

The Sinner pointed to a control panel with several buttons attached to it.

<DO YOU LOVE THE CITY YOU LIVE IN?>

What should you press?

options.messageDesc: Press the button to proceed.
result:
Abnormal input.

“Huh? Now I can’t press any of these…”

Commencing site burial in 3, 2…

“Outta here!!”

After a short notice, the factory exploded with a massive bang.
You managed to stop it from working, but the Sinners were caught up in the explosion as well.

Looks like you should get out of here first, don’t you think?

options.messageDesc: Press the button to stop.
result:
Abnormal input.

“Huh? Now I can’t press any of these…”

Commencing site burial in 3, 2…

“Outta here!!”

After a short notice, the factory exploded with a massive bang.
You managed to stop it from working, but the Sinners were caught up in the explosion as well.

Looks like you should get out of here first, don’t you think?

Detected three inputs.
Operating Emergency Protocol #3: Facility Shutdown.

“Looks like it’s stopped.”

The machines whirred for a short while before stopping.
With that, the cyborgs should no longer revive.

Let’s step outside the factory, shall we?

Continuing augmentation.

must
become
strong.

Please proceed with the input.

dataList.name: 분홍신 선택지1
dataList.desc:
A voice travels between the fluttering ribbons.

“What is your desire?”

“Put me on.”

“I’ll carry you wherever you wish to go.”

The suggestions are incredibly suspicious, but for some reason, the Sinners are struggling to decide what to do.

What do you say?

result:
“Yeah… This is good.”

“It’s all smooth.”

The Sinners expressed their fascination.
Those ribbons had turned into shiny pairs of pink shoes.

Now, everyone will be able to go wherever they want.

Probably.

dataList.name: Vending Machine and Oceanic Waves
dataList.desc:
You see an empty lot ahead where the Sinners can take a rest.

There, you find a vending machine with a number of buttons on it.
You see drinks as well, but you can’t recognize what they’re supposed to depict.
What will you do?

options.message: No need to take risks. Just rest here with the Sinners.
result:
Some time passed.

Thanks to the respite, the group seems to have some energy back.

options.message: Get some drinks they might like, as a treat.
result:
With just a single press,
the machine ejected one can after another.

All the cans are purple.

You can’t fathom the meaning of the ships and grapes doodled on them,
but they somehow feel familiar, and well… cheery.

They should be okay to drink.

You passed the cans out to the Sinners.

dataList.name: The Chicken Strife
dataList.desc:
Some folks are blocking the way.
They’re sitting on a deck, yelling at each other.
“Look at this succulent piece! The rich juice running down the fibers of luscious meat… This is what chicken is about!”
“Wrong. This piece has a clean taste, with not an ounce of grease tainting the tongue. This is the real deal.”
The two turn around at the same time to face you.
“You there! Tell us which is better!”

options.messageDesc: Gain an E.G.O Gift.
result:
“That’s… true.”
“An irrefutable point.”
They lowered their hands and settled down.
“What a strange thing we were fighting over.”
“They’re right… The one truth is that the chicken is always right.”
After a passionate handshake, the two gave you their bucket of chicken.
“A wise gourmet such as yourself deserves both pieces. Please, take this, we insist.”

options.message: Gotta be the drumsticks, all rich and juicy.
options.messageDesc: Gain an E.G.O Gift.
result:
“You see! The drumsticks are better!”
“You don’t know what good taste is.”
The person holding a chicken breast let out a baffled sigh.
“Ey! Here’s your reward. You deserve a drumstick of your own.”
Satisfied, the one with a drumstick handed you another from the bucket.
“I’m counting on you to keep that leg up!”
Unsure of what you’re being trusted with, you left the table with the drumstick.

options.message: The breast, of course, unsullied and spotless.
options.messageDesc: Gain an E.G.O Gift.
result:
“There ain’t no way! You’d give up this banquet of juiciness…?”
“It’s fat, not just juice. The breast is healthy, light, comes in hefty servings, and is easy to eat—it’s obviously the reasonable choice.”
The person holding a piece of chicken breast pleasantly remarked.
“Here, a reward for you. Take this breast.”
A sizable piece was brought out of the bucket.
“Best of luck with your gains. I hope you stay healthy.”
Unsure of what you’re supposed to gain, you left the table with the chicken breast.

dataList.name: Tango of Poultry Passion
dataList.desc:
A bright spotlight shines on a portion of the noisy area.
It seems as though the chickens are attending a… ball.
“That’s the tango.”
Looking at their movements which might be a dance or a tussle, you notice sauce leaking from one of them.
It doesn’t seem to be aware of this…

options.messageDesc: Gain an E.G.O Gift.
result:
“Heed me!!!!! Sauce is leaking from thy body!!!!!!”
“Don’t shout it that loud, you dummy…”
Notified of its leakage, the chicken quickly ran its wings over its back—or what appeared to be its back, rather.
Sadly, the knot had loosened on its stitching.
“Kieegh, kiiierg…”
Does it mean it can’t do it on its own? Approaching with a trail of sauce dripping behind, it held some thread and a needle in its hands, er, wings.
Does it want you to stitch its back?

options.messageDesc: Gain an E.G.O Gift.
result:
“Should we not inform them?”
“Yeah, but~ They look pretty happy right now, don’t they? Couldn’t hurt to sit and watch just a bit longer, right?”
“What will become of it when it loses all its sauce?”
“Maybe it’ll just become an underseasoned chicken.”
In time, the leakage ceased.
“Kiehg!”
Perhaps it noticed that it’s become lighter? It suddenly performed a highly technical move.
“Astonishing.”
The chickens around it stopped their dances and watched its performance, mesmerized. Soon enough, they approached the performer, letting out screams that sounded like cheers.
They walked out of the light, tossing the special one up and down as a celebration.
All that remained… was the spilled sauce.

options.messageDesc: 50% chance to gain an E.G.O Gift.
result:
“Mm-mmm~ Boy, I smell something tasty! I sure wonder where this smell’s coooming frooom~?!”
“…I suppose it would be foolish of me to expect more believable acting.”
The Sinner’s voice caused the chickens to stop their passionate dance at once.
Examining each other’s backs, they soon found the source of the leakage.
“Kieh, kierg.”
“Giiegh.”
Without panicking, they brought some thread and a needle to sew up its back—or what appears to be its back.
They were unsullied in their expertise.
Once the stitching was done, they scuttled into the dark.
All that remained was the thread and needle they used.

dataList.name: Looking for a Drone
dataList.desc:
A broken K Corp. drone is tumbling on the floor.
I can only revive Sinners where I can see the star, so in the meantime...
We might be able to find an ampule to use if we search through it.

options.messageDesc: Nothing happened.
result:
"What're you looking at? There's clearly nothing to grab."
...A closer look could find something useful, but the sharp pieces and debris look like they might cause injury we could've avoided.
We quietly left the room.

dataList.name: Looking for a Drone
dataList.desc: Give the drone another try?

options.messageDesc: Nothing happened.
result:
There wouldn't be a point in risking another injury.
We left the room, complaining about the misfortune.

dataList.name: An Ampule to Use
dataList.desc:
It's filled with K Corp's ampules.
"Ooh~ Good for us! Hey Dante, can't we take at least one of those?"
"Negative. The ampule injector is only in this room, so it will not be possible to use them outside of this place."
...What will we do?

options.messageDesc: Nothing happened.
result:
I'm not sure if it's a good idea to test these things I don't even know well enough on the Sinners.
We just decided to leave the room.

dataList.name: An Ampule to Use
dataList.desc:
"Lo, warnings are written on the ampules!"
Skimming through the glass bottles, I could see tiny notices attached to them.
However, the text was too dense to read properly.
"Missing parts… insufficient… stop? I have no idea what this is saying."
"Manager Esquire! It would appear that this device has two modes: single and group!"
It certainly looks like it's up to me to choose.
What will we do?

options.messageDesc:
All allies that lost HP fully heal.
Allies with full HP lose HP and SP.
result:
Shouldn't hurt to let all the Sinners benefit from it.
I pressed the 'group' button.
"Ngh!"
"This is weird... I'm feeling sick all of a sudden."
A number of Sinners groaned in pain.
Thinking about what they had in common... I realized that they were all uninjured.
"This must not be something you may administer to healthy individuals."
...Better be careful next time.

options.message: Use the ampule on the Sinner in the worst state.
options.messageDesc: The ally with the least HP heals to full HP.
result:
{affectedTarget} looked like the Sinner in the sorriest state, so we stood them at the injector and pressed the 'single' button.
...The Sinner seems to have gotten much better!

dataList.name: Poking at the Egg
dataList.desc:
"Are these... eggs?"
"Please be careful. It might be an Abnormality."
Come to think of it, I was told that the underground lab K Corp. set up also managed eggs from the L Corp. branch.
"Whoa, hey... Is this thing twitching?"
As the Sinner observed, an egg begins to move.
What will we do?

options.messageDesc: Nothing happened.
result:
"What else do we do? We gotta run!"
It couldn't be more true. We quickly escaped the room.

dataList.name: PickingRowAndColumn
dataList.desc:
The area twisted, and a cabinet appeared from it.
You see some items in its drawers.

dataList.name: Make a Wish
dataList.desc:
"Are those... stars up there?"
Looking up, we saw a scenery that looks like a night sky through a crack.
"Lo, a shooting star!!"
I heard that making a wish while a shooting star falls can make it true.
Maybe we'll try it?

options.messageDesc: 50% chance to gain an E.G.O Gift
result:
"Romantic."
Everyone quietly made a wish with their eyes closed.
Could it have evoked a response?
When the eyes were open, a sparkling shard was on the ground. 
"Hmm, I wonder who wished for this?"
The Sinners commented, but it might not have been related to the wishes after all.
We took the shard and left the place.

"Romantic."
Everyone quietly made a wish with their eyes closed.
...However, nothing happened.
"Who was it! One of you must have opened your eyes in the middle of it!"
Coaxing one infuriated Sinner, we left the room.

options.messageDesc: Nothing happened.
result:
If that fanciful tale really was true, I would've gotten my real head back a while ago.
We left the room, believing this choice to be better than wasting our time.

dataList.name: ApproachingTheFlower
dataList.desc: AFloweringTreestands inthemiddleofthePlain. NootherFloweringTreesarenearby(近處). TheFloweringTreestood WithFlowersbloomedinEarnest(熱心) MuchlikehowitthinksofFloweringTreesinitsThoughtsinEarnest. What will you do?

result: TheFloweringTreecannotreachtheFloweringTreeinitsThoughts. A strong shockwave pushed everyone away, denying our approach.

ThefloweringTreecannotreachtheFloweringTreeinitsThoughts. Iranwildly. AsthoughIwasdoingit for(爲)asingleFloweringTree, IdidsuchaPeculiarImitation. Right when you were about to leave, the tree scattered away. You took the branch left in its place.

dataList.name: Run
dataList.desc:
The space twists.
At the same time, a familiar cry is heard from behind.
It somehow bears resemblance to the cry of an Abnormality we reduced to an egg earlier.
"Start running!!"
Thirteen Sinners haphazardly rushed down the path.
"In there!"
"T-That looks like a dead end..."
The Sinners seem scared... Do we still go in there?

options.messageDesc: Begin a combat encounter. Win to gain an E.G.O Gift.
result:
Running into a dead end could obviously end in one way.
"Kgh!"
The Abnormality rammed the Sinners.
"You stubborn bull..."
We have no choice. It has to be suppressed once more.

dataList.name: Run.
dataList.desc:
We keep running down the closed street.
"W-We'll get hit by that thing if we keep up!"
"That bull will only grow faster as the chase goes on..."
The unease is palpable.
What should we do?

options.messageDesc: Begin a combat encounter. Win to gain an E.G.O Gift.
result:
There's no other way.
We might as well stop running and save ourselves a little energy for the inevitable fight...
"Kgh!"
The Abnormality rammed the Sinners.
"You stubborn bull..."
We have no choice. It has to be suppressed once more.

dataList.name: Run.
dataList.desc:
We keep running anyway.
"It would be preferable if there were no other circumstances to worry about.
A Sinner muttered a peculiar remark.
"Huh?!"
Just then, the wall ahead of us morphed into a wide area.
What will we do now?

options.messageDesc: Begin a combat encounter. Win to gain an E.G.O Gift.
result:
We kept running through the passage.
Even though we had no idea where it could lead to...
"What?"
How long did we run?
We ended up in an arena fit for a battle with the Abnormality.
"You stubborn bull..."
We have no choice. It has to be suppressed once more.

options.messageDesc: Gain an E.G.O Gift.
result:
This is where the run ends.
That scary thing will charge at us, and knowing that makes it doubly scary.
But still, I somehow had the feeling that we'll be alright.
"Ah..."
The Abnormality passed through us and disappeared into the unknown.
We found a blue fluid in its trail.

dataList.name: Try Talking
dataList.desc:
Mysterious figures glimmer in the window.
Should we do something?

result:
I wish that silence was scolded.
Itwouldatleastmakesomenoiseifyoutoreacelestialbodyapart.
The window shattered all of a sudden, and its fragments fell on the Sinners.
All the Sinners were hurt.
"...It hurt physically."
We left the room, some shards still stuck on our bodies.

dataList.name: Stand in his way.
dataList.desc:
Dongrang no longer feels pity for test subjects.

Even if his technology isn't recognized...
Even when he thinks of the yellow calf in his hometown...
He isn't sad anymore.

"The past is all useless. I'll burn it all."

"And Yi Sang, I'd like you gone as well."

Dongrang begins to rush at Yi Sang.

dataList.name: Stand in his way.
dataList.desc:
"I've... decided to erase all of the past."

"In other words, I will have no business left with you once Yi Sang is gone."

Dongrang frowned, seeming quite displeased.

"And yet... Why do you keep interrupting?"

Dongrang seems to be preparing for a powerful attack. Maybe this gap could be exploited.

dataList.name: Stand in his way.
dataList.desc:
"I really shouldn't be wasting my time like this."

Coming to a sudden realization, Dongrang stopped in place.
And he looked at the ceiling as though he was looking up at stars in the sky.

"At this very moment... I'm losing out for each second it spends without crying."

"The opportunities and time to change the world... are scattering."

Dongrang then glared with bloodshot eyes.

"Yi Sang... It's you, you're the only one who needs to go for this to be over!"

dataList.name: Picking a Row and Column
dataList.desc:
Many objects appeared in the hidden compartment.
They might be useful for the coming encounters.
What should we take?

options.message: Pick the drawer on the second row, fifth column.
options.messageDesc: Gain an E.G.O Gift.
result:
You took the item out of the drawer on the second row, fifth column.
It's a mysterious green mass.
When you look at it, it kind of resembles a mask.
Soon, the area began to blur, and the cabinet disappeared.

options.message: Pick the drawer on the fifth row, eighth column.
options.messageDesc: Gain an E.G.O Gift.
result:
You took the item out of the drawer on the fifth row, eighth column.
It's a mysterious blue mass.
When you look at it, it kind of resembles a knife.
Soon, the area began to blur, and the cabinet disappeared.

options.message: Pick the drawer on the sixth row, first column.
options.messageDesc: Gain an E.G.O Gift.
result:
You took the item out of the drawer on the sixth row, first column.
It's a mysterious yellow mass.
When you look at it, it kind of resembles a flower.
Soon, the area began to blur, and the cabinet disappeared.
